resources.string: 0 – 720 hours (0 - to create a perpetual link)

string-array.name: noLinksHistory
string-array.item: To use history, shorten at least 1 link

resources.string: Please provide access to your advertising ID

This app is free, but it contains ads.
Due to the fact that AdMob by default uses an advertising intensifier, and Google Play requires the user's consent to use the advertising intensifier, you need either to allow access to the intensifier, or to refuse to use this application.

Privacy policy is available in the About window.
